<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit an array of FileChecksum entries. We index into this table using the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// user-provided file number.  Each entry may be a variable number of bytes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// determined by the checksum kind and size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> File : Files) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">    CurrentOffset += 4; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// String table offset.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!File.ChecksumKind) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">          4; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// One byte each for checksum size and kind, then align to 4 bytes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurrentOffset += 2; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// One byte each for checksum size and kind.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurrentOffset += File.Checksum.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurrentOffset = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(CurrentOffset, 4);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Output checksum table offset of the given file number.  It is possible that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not all files have been registered yet, and so the offset cannot be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt;</a>, 4&gt; GapAndRangeSizes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;LastLabel = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">    LastLabel = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#a34bd74317e3f04bfc4318c2d1a470877">Range</a>.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write down each range where the variable is defined.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0, E = Frag.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccvdefrangefragment/#a3959776b75cad0ae0cb14c16b2454150">getRanges</a>().size(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != E;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the range size of multiple consecutive ranges is under the max,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// combine the ranges and emit some gaps.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;RangeBegin = Frag.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccvdefrangefragment/#a3959776b75cad0ae0cb14c16b2454150">getRanges</a>()&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RangeSize = GapAndRangeSizes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; J != E; ++J) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GapAndRangeSize = GapAndRangeSizes&#91;J&#93;.first + GapAndRangeSizes&#91;J&#93;.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RangeSize + GapAndRangeSize &gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a25ab8c1ee55e8f8046faa4da99da5f55a2fa4bac49a23af56c1a3fcd0da807d44">MaxDefRange</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal">      RangeSize += GapAndRangeSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumGaps = J - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer">support::endian::Writer</a> LEWriter(OS, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae1e26e57357947b25e392fd18ab000dbaaae6635e044ac56046b2893a529b5114">llvm::endianness::little</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Bias = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We must split the range into chunks of MaxDefRange, this is a fundamental</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// limitation of the file format.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint16&#95;t Chunk = std::min((uint32&#95;t)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a25ab8c1ee55e8f8046faa4da99da5f55a2fa4bac49a23af56c1a3fcd0da807d44">MaxDefRange</a>, RangeSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr">MCSymbolRefExpr</a> &#42;SRE = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a9914b597552aa4b4bcbb8acaa04d632a">MCSymbolRefExpr::create</a>(RangeBegin, Ctx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcbinaryexpr">MCBinaryExpr</a> &#42;BE =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcbinaryexpr/#a3cbe1086ebf00680e8dc374e07305cfb">MCBinaryExpr::createAdd</a>(SRE, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcconstantexpr/#af9bdc4c9c65ea1ff077fbbb6407d7b2a">MCConstantExpr::create</a>(Bias, Ctx), Ctx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Each record begins with a 2-byte number indicating how large the record</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FixedSizePortion = Frag.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccvdefrangefragment/#a6ac329b00989fb4830246ea923755597">getFixedSizePortion</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Our record is a fixed sized prefix and a LocalVariableAddrRange that we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are artificially constructing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RecordSize = FixedSizePortion.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codeview/localvariableaddrrange">LocalVariableAddrRange</a>) + 4 &#42; NumGaps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write out the record size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">      LEWriter.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer/#a16a69d4248bb11c84536099421ea833b">write</a>&lt;uint16&#95;t&gt;(RecordSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write out the fixed size prefix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">      OS &lt;&lt; FixedSizePortion;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make space for a fixup that will eventually have a section relative</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// relocation pointing at the offset where the variable becomes live.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">      Fixups.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup/#abdf37854fa6eb68017b96486df443a32">MCFixup::create</a>(Contents.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(), BE, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a8b2acba82b6d0830ab47d67eb8f1ccf0">FK&#95;SecRel&#95;4</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">      LEWriter.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer/#a16a69d4248bb11c84536099421ea833b">write</a>&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;(0); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fixup for code start.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make space for a fixup that will record the section index for the code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">      Fixups.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup/#abdf37854fa6eb68017b96486df443a32">MCFixup::create</a>(Contents.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>(), BE, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a128346d352fde2e704c07867f4d82eef">FK&#95;SecRel&#95;2</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">      LEWriter.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer/#a16a69d4248bb11c84536099421ea833b">write</a>&lt;uint16&#95;t&gt;(0); </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fixup for section index.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Write down the range&#39;s extent.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">      LEWriter.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer/#a16a69d4248bb11c84536099421ea833b">write</a>&lt;uint16&#95;t&gt;(Chunk);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Move on to the next range.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">      Bias += Chunk;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">      RangeSize -= Chunk;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RangeSize &gt; 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Emit the gaps afterwards.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((NumGaps == 0 || Bias &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#a25ab8c1ee55e8f8046faa4da99da5f55a2fa4bac49a23af56c1a3fcd0da807d44">MaxDefRange</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;large ranges should not have gaps&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GapStartOffset = GapAndRangeSizes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;.second;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != J; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GapSize, RangeSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; GapAndRangeSizes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::tie(GapSize, RangeSize) = GapAndRangeSizes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">      LEWriter.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/support/endian/writer/#a16a69d4248bb11c84536099421ea833b">write</a>&lt;uint16&#95;t&gt;(GapStartOffset);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">      GapStartOffset += GapSize + RangeSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
